title: Award-Winning Club Exclusivity at One of Shanghai’s Most Luxurious Hotels
description: Brought to you by one of the world’s most opulent hotel brands, experience China like a celebrity in beyond five-star luxury with exclusive Horizon Club Lounge access at the Jing An Shangri-La, West Shanghai. Explore the skyscrapers, street food, oriental architecture, fine-dining restaurants and shopping of bustling Shanghai staying in a luxurious city sanctuary that’ll have you indulging in the many benefits of VIP club access as well as a daily buffet breakfast and a guaranteed late 1pm checkout.
location_description: Jing An Shangri-La West Shanghai
offer_address: 1218 Yan'an Middle Rd, Jingan Qu, Shanghai Shi, China, 200040

title: China: Five-Star Opulence at the Shangri-La, Shanghai
description: Brought to you by one of the world’s most opulent hotel brands, experience China in beyond five-star luxury with exclusive Horizon Club lounge access at the Pudong Shangri-La, East Shanghai. Explore the skyscrapers, street food, oriental architecture, fine-dining restaurants and shopping of vibrant Shanghai with daily breakfast, nightly cocktail, refreshments from 6.30am - midnight each day, spa credit and more included.
location_description: Pudong Shangri-La, East Shanghai*
offer_address: 33 Fucheng Rd, LuJiaZui, Pudong Xinqu, Shanghai Shi, China, 200120

title: Experience the Glitz of the World’s Second Bellagio - In Shanghai
description: If you’ve been to Las Vegas, chances are you’ve stopped by the Bellagio Hotel and Casino, and if you haven’t there’s no doubt you’ve heard of the hotel’s world-famous water fountain show. What you may not have heard is that this A-list hotel has recently opened its second outpost, taking its glitz and grandeur to the bustling city of Shanghai. Enjoy a three, five or seven-night stay with daily continental breakfast, two multi-course dining experiences, cocktails to enjoy at the award-winning LAGO restaurant, guaranteed late 2pm checkout and more.
location_description: Bellagio Shanghai
offer_address: No.188 Beisuzhou Road Hongkou District, Shanghai, 200080, P.R. China

title: Stay at Shanghai’s #1 Hotel with Massages and Decadent Dining Experiences
description: Home to epic skyscrapers and busy city streets, Shanghai is a city full of surprises. Find some calm in the chaos with your stay at the iconic Banyan Tree Shanghai on the Bund, rated the #1 hotel in Shanghai on TripAdvisor. Located on the banks of Huangpu River, you’ll be able to take it all in from this stunning hotel located right on The Bund, the most vibrant area of Shanghai. Includes a luxurious massage, cocktail at the hotel's rooftop bar overlooking the city, a decadent dinner at Oceans restaurant, an elegant afternoon tea at the Banyan Lounge, daily breakfast and so much more.
location_description: Banyan Tree Shanghai on The Bund
offer_address: 19 Gongping Rd, Hongkou Qu, Shanghai Shi, China, 200000

title: Suite Escape in Shanghai with Business Class Lounge Access and Sky-High Dome Bar
description: Immerse yourself in one of the dynamic cities in the world, staying in the heart of the action at Radisson Blu Shanghai New World, a glittering high rise boasting panoramic city views from its 47th-floor Sky Dome Bar. Enjoy access to the exclusive Business Class Lounge on the 35th floor with daily buffet breakfast, all-day non-alcoholic drinks, nightly alcohol and canapes and more, plus a CNY¥200 spa credit, guaranteed late checkout until 1pm, welcome tea on arrival and a two-for-one drink at the Sky Dome Bar.
location_description: Radisson Blu Hotel Shanghai New World - OLD
offer_address: 88 Nanjing W Rd, NanJing XiLu, Huangpu Qu, Shanghai Shi, China, 200000

title: Suite Escape in Shanghai with Business Class Lounge Access
description: Immerse yourself in one of the dynamic cities in the world, staying in the heart of the action at Radisson Blu Shanghai New World, a glittering high rise boasting panoramic city views from its 47th-floor Sky Dome Bar. Enjoy access to the exclusive Business Class Lounge on the 35th floor with daily buffet breakfast, all-day non-alcoholic drinks, nightly alcoholic drinks and canapés and more, plus a CNY¥200 spa credit, guaranteed 1pm late checkout, welcome tea on arrival and a two-for-one drink at the Sky Dome Bar.
location_description: Radisson Blu Hotel Shanghai New World
offer_address: 88 Nanjing W Rd, NanJing XiLu, Huangpu Qu, Shanghai Shi, China, 200000

title: China's Highest Skyscraper: Shanghai Luxury with Daily Breakfast, Nightly Cocktails & Fine Dining
description:
Reach new levels of luxury at this sky-high spectacular, soaring above the clouds atop China’s tallest skyscraper. At J Hotel Shanghai Tower, every room offers the kind of views usually reserved for observation decks, paired with lavish finishes that redefine the high life. This isn’t just a stay - it’s a statement.

On the 84th floor, a photo-worthy pool opens onto an expansive viewing deck, where guests can drift from the water to the clouds. This landmark stay also offers seven fine dining restaurants and bars, covering everything from Japanese and Cantonese to Mediterranean and even a patisserie. Don't miss Heavenly Jin, one of the world's highest restaurants, sitting 556 metres above ground. 

A realm of luxury like this calls for indulgent rituals at the onsite spa, while the state-of-the-art fitness centre keeps your routine on track. Positioned near the grand waterfront of The Bund, the hotel puts you in Shanghai’s beating heart - simply ask your butler to arrange your city adventures.
location_description: J Hotel Shanghai Tower
offer_address: Shanghai Tower, 126 Dong Tai Road, Lujiazui Pudong New District, Shanghai, China

title: Cosmopolitan Shanghai Escape with Seven Onsite Restaurants
description: Gourmands everywhere flock to the city-slick InterContinental Shanghai Jing'an, an IHG Hotel for their next stay in this glamorous city. Alongside the hotel's innovative design, seven exceptional dining venues are set to send your tastebuds into a frenzy. For fresh sashimi and teppanyaki, dine at Koi Japanese Restaurant. When you're craving seafood, be wined and dined in Treasure Shabu's private rooms. And when you can't go without dim sum, reserve a table at Jade Chinese Restaurant to get your fix.
location_description: InterContinental Shanghai Jing'An, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: No. 500 Heng Feng Road, Jing An District, Shanghai, China, 200070

title: Stylish Shanghai City Stay Opposite Fudan University
description: Study the scintillating sights of Shanghai at Crowne Plaza Shanghai Fudan, an IHG Hotel, only steps from the prestigious Fudan University. Peruse the upscale boutiques of Xintiandi, brush up on Art Deco architecture at The Bund or find a moment of zen contemplation amongst the ponds and pavillions at Yuyuan Gardens. As night falls, feast on a fusion of East and West flavours at He Yuan or hunt for shansi leng mian on the skyscraper-framed streets of Shanghai.
location_description: Crowne Plaza Shanghai Fudan, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: 199 Handan Road, Shanghai, 200433, China

title: Opulent Shanghai Escape with Indoor Pool, Four Restaurants & Bars
description:
Soak up the buzz of the city while kicking back in high-rise comfort at this lavish urban sanctuary. With sleek rooms, skyline views and direct access to one of Shanghai’s top shopping malls, it’s got the best of both worlds. Whether you’re here for business or fun, everything Shanghai has to offer is at your fingertips.

Smack in the heart of the Putuo District, you’re steps from Jinshajiang Road metro station and moments from the city’s must-sees. Start your day with a dip in the indoor pool, or wind down at night with cocktails at Sky Bar overlooking the city lights. From rooftop moments to retail therapy, this is Shanghai living done right.
location_description: Hyatt Regency Shanghai Global Harbor
offer_address: 718 Ningxia Road, Putuo District, Shanghai 200063, China

title: Shanghai Cosmopolitan Glamour with High-End Culinary Scene
description: You're perfectly placed to experience Shanghai's intriguing balance between the ancient world and modern civilisation when you stay at InterContinental Shanghai Expo, an IHG Hotel. Between exploring silver skyscrapers and long-standing temples, retreat to the glitzy hotel and take your tastebuds on a journey at the four onsite restaurants. Foodies will delight in the interactive show kitchens and live cooking stations, traditional Cantonese fare, wood-fired Italian pizzas and pub-style British nosh.
location_description: InterContinental Shanghai Expo, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: 1188 Xueye Road, Pudong New Area, Shanghai, 200125, China

title: Qingpu Shanghai Stay near Xiayang Lake with Onsite Zoo, Playground & Tennis Court
description: Perfect for a family-friendly escape in Qingpu, Crowne Plaza Shanghai Xiayang Lake, an IHG Hotel delivers fun for all ages, with a small onsite zoo, playground and indoor activity room to keep the tiny travellers entertained, and a tennis court, billiards room and spa for the grown-ups. Ready to unwind further? This waterside location means soothing strolls through the lush foliage and serene views of Xiayanghu Square are only moments away.
location_description: Crowne Plaza Shanghai Xiayang Lake, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: No. 303 Qingzhou Road, QingPu District, Shanghai 201700, China

title: Stylish Pullman Stay in Centre of Shanghai with Onsite Dining, Pool & Spa
description:
Rising above the dynamic heart of Shanghai, this 52-story landmark blends cosmopolitan energy with upscale comfort. Ideally located near vibrant hubs like Xintiandi and Tianzifang, with direct metro access across the street, the hotel places you moments from The Bund, People’s Square and premier shopping districts.

After a day of exploration by foot, bike, or car, unwind in the soothing embrace of the indoor pool or sauna. Savour global flavours at Taste Garden, a serene garden-level restaurant with a terrace beside a peaceful pond. Whether staying for business or leisure, this hotel covers you for both in iconic Pullman style.
location_description: Pullman Shanghai Central
offer_address: 15 Dapu Road Huangpu District, Shanghai, China, 200023

title: Soothing Shanghai Pujiang Stay with Verdant Garden Views
description: After a night of downtown glitz and glamour, seek restful rejuvenation at Crowne Plaza Shanghai Pujiang, an IHG Hotel. Between expeditions to the heart of this vibrant city, recharge by floating in the crystal-clear swimming pool, sampling Cantonese delicacies at Cai Feng Lou or savouring steaks seared to perfection at CHAR Bar & Bistro. When adventure calls, navigate the fabulous floral rainbow of Pujiang Country Park or the towering skyscraper-framed streets of Shanghai.
location_description: Crowne Plaza Shanghai Pujiang, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: No. 3701, Chenhang, Minhang District, Shanghai 201114, China

title: Shanghai Sophisticated Urban Shopping Break
description: In the heart of Shanghai and surrounded by luxury retail, InterContinental Shanghai Pudong, an IHG Hotel, delivers a glamorous urban break in this cosmopolitan city. Explore authentic markets, trendy art studios and gorgeous gardens. Savour sumptuous Shanghai delicacies at Oriental House restaurant or work up a sweat at the fitness centre and indoor pool. As the sun sets, unwind with a glass of wine at Lounge777 before retiring to a stylish and sophisticated guest room.
location_description: InterContinental Shanghai Pudong, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: No.777 Zhangyang Road, Pudong New Area, Shanghai, 200120, China

title: Stylish Shanghai City Break in Ultra-Modern Pudong District
description: In the heart of the city’s most exciting new entertainment and business district, Crowne Plaza Pudong Shanghai, an IHG Hotel, offers guests access to the ancient metropolis’s celebrated past and shining future. After days exploring Pudong’s wealth of attractions - including the Shanghai Tower, Lujiazui Central Green Space and massive Shanghai Ocean Aquarium - return to the bamboo-filled lobby for Shanghai favourites at Mei Hua Xuan or Japanese plates at Windows Café.
location_description: Crowne Plaza Pudong Shanghai, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: No. 1000 Yang Gao North Road, Pudong New Area, Shanghai 200137, China

title: Shanghai Spectacular Underwater Stay with Cliff-Face Views
description: Equal parts luxury hotel and awe-inspiring experience, the InterContinental Shanghai Wonderland, an IHG Hotel, is a man-made marvel in the heart of the city. Go rock-climbing 88 metres into the earth, admire waterfall views over the lake and devour seafood while surrounded by denizens of the deep at the Mr. Fisher Restaurant. Bring the day to an indulgent end with a scotch to savour at the Quarry Bar before retiring for a peaceful slumber in one of the hotel's underwater rooms.
location_description: InterContinental Shanghai Wonderland, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: Chen Hua Road No. 5888, Songjiang District, Shanghai, 201619, China

title: Elegant Shanghai City Escape on Nanjing Road Shopping Street
description: The glitz and glamour of Shanghai is at your fingertips at Crowne Plaza Shanghai Nanjing Road, an IHG Hotel, only steps from one of the world's busiest shopping streets. Indulge in retail therapy on the bustling Nanjing Road Pedestrian Street before basking in the sun amid verdant lawns and lush foliage in the skyscraper-framed People's Park. Savour Sichuan delicacies in the refined Regents Restaurant or seek succulent street food on a whirlwind night tour of neon-lit Shanghai.
location_description: Crowne Plaza Shanghai Nanjing Road, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: No. 700 Jiujiang Road / No.719 East Nanjing Road, Huangpu District, Shanghai, 200001, Mainland China

title: Five-Star Shanghai Regent Retreat on Huangpu River Waterfront
description: Treat yourself to a stylish retreat on Shanghai's illustrious Huangpu River waterfront. Soak up views of the historic Bund and Shanghai's iconic skyline from your contemporary room or suite, each featuring Oasis bathtubs and spacious leisure areas. Savour fine dining with views over the Bund at Harmonia, where global cuisine is served from a roaring open kitchen; taste authentic Cantonese flavours at the elegant Jin Lin and start or end your day with pastries from Conde Boutique. This dreamy hotel also offers serene wellness facilities, including an indoor swimming pool and modern fitness centre. Thanks to its prime location at the crossroads of the Suzhou River, a visit to the famous Garden Bridge and Grand Halls is within reach.
location_description: Regent Shanghai on the Bund, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: 60 Huangpu Road, Hongkou District, Shanghai 200082, China

title: Tranquil Chongming Island Escape with Three Restaurants & Indoor Pool
description:
Retreat to the peaceful charm of Chongming Island, where this nature-inspired escape offers modern comfort amid wetlands, forests and slow-paced village life. Designed to echo traditional Jiangnan architecture, the resort is a serene haven surrounded by blooming gardens and fresh country air, an hour from Shanghai.

Take a refreshing dip in the indoor pool, lounge on the terrace or maintain your wellness routine at the onsite fitness centre. Savour farm-to-table cuisine at Market Café, indulge in refined Shanghai and Chongming flavours with fresh and authentic Chongming local food at Pin Yue and enjoy a spacious Lobby Lounge area for relaxing. Wander through Dongping National Forest Park, kayak the wetlands, or cycle tree-lined country roads - this is the perfect base to explore Chongming.
location_description: Hyatt Regency Chongming
offer_address: Lane 799, Lan Hai Road, Chenji, Chongming District, Shanghai 202162, China

title: Modern Parisian-Inspired Retreat in Shanghai with Rooftop Infinity Pool
description: Experience elegance, luxury and sophisticated Paris-inspired charm in the heart of China’s Pudong District with a stay at the Kimpton Qiantan Shanghai, an IHG Hotel. A seamless fusion of modern luxuries and traditional Shanghainese and European touches creates a blissful retreat surrounded by enchanting gardens with a distinctly French flair. Eat, drink, and celebrate every occasion here with the onsite restaurant and bar, and enjoy a rooftop swim in the resort's infinity pool.
location_description: Kimpton Qiantan Shanghai, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: No.9, Lane 199 Qian Tan Avenue, Pudong District, Shanghai, China

title: Sophisticated Shanghai Lakefront City Break with Onsite Dining & Indoor Pool
description:
Admire the timeless beauty of Songjiang, the cultural cradle of Shanghai, with a serene stay at this Hyatt sanctuary overlooking Wulong Lake. Songjiang’s 6,000-year history breathes through the nearby ancient pagodas, traditional gardens and cultural parks, while the hotel pays tribute to the region’s legacy with design elements inspired by its storied textile traditions.

Wake up to tranquil views, swim in the sparkling indoor pool and try out authentic Jiangsu and Zhejiang cuisine, including the signature Peking duck at the hotel's Xiang Yue restaurant. Explore the city's cultural gems and return to your hotel for well-crafted cocktails, all while you soak up Shanghai's beauty.
location_description: Hyatt Regency Shanghai Songjiang
offer_address: Block 3, 599 Guangfulin Road, Songjiang District, Shanghai 201613, China

title: Shanghai Cinema-Themed City Centre Hideaway
description: Designed as a tribute to cinema sophistication, the Crowne Plaza Shanghai, an IHG Hotel will make you feel like a superstar amidst the dazzling neon lights of Shanghai. Pamper yourself in upscale Xintiandi boutiques or take the perfect close-up along the picturesque waterfront of the Bund heritage district. As night falls, lose yourself in reverie with a smooth scotch framed by movie paraphernalia at the Lobby Lounge or venture out to experience Shanghai's dynamic nightlife.
location_description: Crowne Plaza Shanghai, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: 400 Pan Yu Road, Shanghai 200052, China

title: Shanghai Anting Golf Club Escape
description: Framed by the sweeping grounds of Enhance Anting Golf Club, Crowne Plaza Shanghai Anting, an IHG Hotel, is an urban haven boasting rolling hills and emerald lawns. Start the day with an energising round of golf, marvel at Shanghai Auto Museum's collection of vintage vehicles or find high-octane entertainment at Shanghai International Circuit. Sample diverse dishes at the multiple onsite restaurants or venture into glamourous Shanghai for succulent xiao long bao and glitzy nightlife.
location_description: Crowne Plaza Shanghai Anting, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: No. 6555 Boyuan Road, Jiading District, Shanghai 201804, China

title: Shanghai Putuo Urban Escape at 118 Plaza Shopping District
description: Standing adjacent to the sprawling 118 Plaza commercial hub in Shanghai's Putuo district, Crowne Plaza Shanghai Noah Square, an IHG Hotel is a stylish base camp for exploring this sophisticated city. The traditional shikumen alleys and upscale boutiques of Xintiandi are only minutes away, with subway access nearby. On your return, sample sizzling Cantonese cuisine at Noah Cook before experiencing the vibrant nightlife of downtown Shanghai.
location_description: Crowne Plaza Shanghai Noah Square, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: No.1699, Jinshajiang Road, Putuo District, Shanghai 200333, China

title: Grand Historic Shanghai Five-Star Retreat on Ruijin Er Road
description: Step back in time and discover the everlasting opulence of Old Shanghai with a five-star stay at InterContinental Shanghai Ruijin, an IHG Hotel. Formerly the resplendent State Guest House of Shanghai, this hotel has an unrivalled heritage, having hosted revolutionaries and aristocrats throughout its esteemed history. Savour distinguished Chinese fine dining at Xin Yuan Lou or wander through leafy Ruijin Er Road’s storied mansions, lush parks and upscale shopping avenues.
location_description: InterContinental Shanghai Ruijin, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: 118 Ruijin Er Road, Shanghai, 200020, China

vendor_name: Hotel Indigo Shanghai On The Bund
title: Shanghai Bund Waterfront Stay with Rooftop Dining
description: Boasting shimmering Huangpu River views, Hotel Indigo Shanghai on the Bund, an IHG Hotel, is your ticket to the Bund's picturesque heritage district. Discover the grand architecture of Shanghai's waterfront strip or enjoy tranquil koi-filled ponds and rockeries at the Yu Gardens. On your return, take a tea break in the Quay cafe's library or savour a flame-seared steak as you gaze out over dazzling neon lights from the rooftop terrace at CHAR Bar & Grill.
location_description: Hotel Indigo Shanghai on the Bund, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: No 585 Zhongshan Dong Er Road, Huangpu District, Shanghai, SH 200010, China

title: Sky-High Shanghai Five-Star Opulence near Oriental Pearl Tower with Seven Restaurants & Indoor Pool
description:
Soar above Shanghai’s glittering skyline in one of the world’s highest hotels with a stay in the iconic Jin Mao Tower, offering panoramic views of the Huangpu River and The Bund. Housed between the 58th and 85th floors of this architecturally awe-inspiring building, this Grand Hyatt sanctuary boasts elegant rooms featuring allusions to the city's Art Deco heritage.

Step outside to explore top attractions including the Oriental Pearl Tower and Nanjing Road, all just moments away, or hop on the nearby Lujiazui Metro for seamless city access. Back at the hotel, embark on a culinary journey across celebrated restaurants: from traditional Cantonese to gourmet Japanese fare, there is much to feast on. Later, head to Cloud 9, perched on the 87th floor, for well-crafted cocktails paired with unbeatable views.
location_description: Grand Hyatt Shanghai
offer_address: 1 East Chang An Avenue, Pudong, Shanghai, China, 200121

title: Shanghai Urban Oasis with Four Onsite Restaurants & Bars, Infinity Pool & Spa
description:
Transition from Shanghai’s bustling streets to the quiet calm of this harmonious haven resort, soaking up the city's rich history while embracing restorative reflection. Explore the vibrant Jing’an district, uncover the secrets of the Zhangyuan heritage site and connect to nature at the nearby Jing’an Park.

Unwind with soothing treatments at Spa Alila, a welcome respite with skilled therapists and innovative healing therapies, or dip in the expansive 19-metre infinity pool. When hunger strikes, dine at one of four onsite restaurants and bars -- participate in an afternoon tea ceremony at Chayan @ 5TH, sip on cocktails at the top-floor Secret Roof, or enjoy expertly grilled Japanese robatayaki at Garden Pavilion.
location_description: Alila Shanghai
offer_address: 500 Weihai Road, Jing An District, Shanghai 200041, China

title: Five-Star Shanghai Stay with Skyscraper Sights & Infinity Pool
description: Showcasing the scintillating skyline of the Shanghai business district, the Regent Shanghai Pudong offers an opulent retreat from the bustling city. Relish the glamourous view from the indoor infinity swimming pool, work up a sweat at the 24-hour fitness centre or indulge in a unique treatment at the top-floor Flare Spa. Savour elegant fine dining at the onsite restaurants before retiring to a sophisticated room high in the sky.
location_description: Regent Shanghai Pudong, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: 210 Century Avenue, 200120 Pudong District, Shanghai 200001, China

title: Stylish Central Shanghai Pullman Stay near Railway Station with Three Restaurants, Pool & Spa
description:
Experience the vibrancy of Shanghai from this modern base in the heart of the city's bustling Xuhui District. The hotel's sleek, contemporary design and world-class facilities, including a state-of-the-art fitness centre and an indoor pool, make it the perfect retreat after days of exploration.

Venture out to discover the district's rich cultural heritage, with the Longhua Temple and the Shanghai Botanical Garden just a short drive away. Savour authentic Cantonese cuisine at the hotel's elegant Yue Chinese Restaurant, or sip a cocktail at the elegant Bar 99.
location_description: Pullman Shanghai Xuhui
offer_address: 1 Pubei Road, Xuhui District, 200235, Shanghai, China

title: Modern Grand Mercure Shanghai City Break near Hongqiao CBD & Airport with Restaurant & Spa
description:
Nestled in the heart of Shanghai's vibrant Hongqiao district, this contemporary hotel offers comfort and convenience in equal measure. Just a stone's throw from Hongqiao International Airport, high-end shopping malls like L'Avenue and The Place, and the exceptional restaurants along Xianxia Road, this sleek sanctuary allows you to enjoy all Shanghai has to offer.

Return to the hotel for a French-inspired fine dining affair or a themed buffet dinner at L’Atrium, let the expert therapists melt away your stress at Yi Spa or enjoy a nightcap at Le 98 Lounge on the hotel's first floor, before retreating to the comfort of your elegant room.
location_description: Grand Mercure Shanghai Hongqiao
offer_address: 369 Xian Xia Road, Changning District, Shanghai 200336, China

title: Stylish Shanghai Stay near Shanghai Tower with Sky-High Dining & Indoor Pool
description:
Discover the exciting energy of Shanghai’s Pudong district from this sleek, sky-high retreat, perfectly positioned near the city’s most iconic attractions. At Novotel Shanghai Atlantis, enjoy a heated indoor pool, fitness centre and a spectacular 50th-floor restaurant offering an international buffet paired with sweeping city views.

Step outside to visit the nearby Oriental Pearl Tower, stroll along the scenic Huangpu River or immerse yourself in local culture at Yuyuan Old Street, famed for its traditional architecture, vibrant shops and exquisite dining options.
location_description: Novotel Shanghai Atlantis
offer_address: 728 Pu Dong Avenue, Shanghai 200120, China

title: Shanghai Stylish Cinema-Inspired Stay with High-Floor Dining
description: Get in touch with your inner movie star at the film-inspired Hotel Indigo Shanghai Jing'An, an IHG Hotel, blending cinematic motifs with Shanghai's glitz and glamour for a sophisticated stay. Shop 'til you drop on the world's longest shopping street, Nanjing Road, before seeking moments of peace under the gilded roof of Jing'an Temple. On your return, sample sumptuous street food at Docks Cafe or relish sky-high cocktails framed by Suzhou Creek views at the high-floor 500 Restaurant & Bar.
location_description: Hotel Indigo Shanghai Jing'An, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: No. 28 Yutong Road, Jingan District, Shanghai, SH 200070, China

title: Shanghai Casual Luxury with Outdoor Swimming Pool
description: Stay within a stone's throw of Shanghai's neon-lit cityscape when you choose Hotel Indigo Shanghai Hongqiao, an IHG Hotel as your base for exploration. The bustling business district of Hongqiao offers plenty in ways of entertainment, with a plethora of restaurants, cafes, shopping and day spas right outside your hotel's doors. When you're not out and about, stay in and enjoy your hotel's swimming pool, test out the equipment at the fitness centre and enjoy a fresh coffee at Craft Cafe.
location_description: Hotel Indigo Shanghai Hongqiao, an IHG hotel
offer_address: No.43 Lane 188 Yonghong Road, Minhang District, Shanghai 201106 China

title: Shanghai High-End Hotel within the National Exhibition and Convention Centre
description: Located within the National Exhibition and Convention Centre, the InterContinental Shanghai Hongqiao NECC, an IHG Hotel, is perfect for business travellers looking for a stylish and convenient stay. Get in touch with your inner gastronome at the interactive kitchens of Five Live All Day Dining, work up a sweat at the fitness centre complete with jacuzzi and swimming pools, explore Shanghai via the nearby subway network or retire for a restful slumber in one of the gorgeous guest rooms.
location_description: InterContinental Shanghai Hongqiao NECC, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: Gate 3, No. 1700 Zhuguang Road, Shanghai, 201702, Mainland China

title: Shanghai Hongqiao Convenient Airport Stay
description: Make the most of every moment in this captivating city at Crowne Plaza Shanghai Hongqiao, an IHG Hotel, with convenient Hongqiao Airport and railway access only minutes away. Indulge in retail therapy at the upscale boutiques of Xintiandi or enjoy serene sightseeing along the waterfront of the Bund historic district on the Huangpu River. Sample Cantonese cuisine at Cai Feng Lou restaurant or a glass of wine at the Bistro with the assurance that your flight is only minutes away.
location_description: Crowne Plaza Shanghai Hongqiao, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: No.1-3, Lane 630, Shenchang Road, Minhang District, Shanghai 201107, China

title: Hyatt Shanghai Riverside Retreat With Four Restaurants & Indoor Pool
description:
Experience the epitome of Shanghai luxury with a stay at this five-star retreat, majestically positioned on the banks of the Huangpu River. Hyatt on the Bund Hotel offers breathtaking views of both the historic Bund and the futuristic Pudong skyline. Dine at one of the innovative onsite restaurants and bars, including authentic Chinese cuisine at Xindalu - China Kitchen and an international buffet at Aroma.

The hotel’s Yuan Spa offers a tranquil sanctuary for relaxation and rejuvenation, with a range of treatments, plunge pools, saunas and more. Venture out to explore the vibrant city, with the famous Yu Garden and bustling Nanjing Road shopping district a short drive away or visit the Bund Sightseeing Tunnel and Pudong's business district.
location_description: Hyatt on the Bund Hotel
offer_address: 199 Huangpu Road, Hongkou District, Shanghai 200120, China

title: Sophisticated Central Shanghai Luxury with Four Restaurants & Bars, Indoor Pool & Spa
description:
Immerse yourself in the vibrant heart of Shanghai with a stay at this luxurious hotel by Hyatt. Andaz Xintiandi, Shanghai offers easy access to some of the city's most iconic attractions, including The Bund, Yu Garden, People's Square and the lively shopping streets of Huaihai Road and Nanjing Road.

After a day of exploration, retreat to the hotel's Bleu Bar terrace, where you can sip on world-class drinks while soaking in sweeping views of the glittering skyline - a perfect way to unwind against the mesmerising night lights of this famous city.
location_description: Andaz Xintiandi, Shanghai
offer_address: 88 Songshan Road, Shanghai 200021, China

title: Serene Shanghai Island Retreat on Lake Dishui with Outdoor Infinity Pool
description: Escape to the Eden-like InterContinental Shanghai Harbour City, an IHG Hotel - a lakeside resort offering a peaceful retreat away from the bustle of the city. This impeccably designed haven boasts unparalleled lake views, a state-of-the-art fitness centre, heated indoor pool plus a glittering outdoor infinity pool. When you can tear yourself away from this elegant resort, find yourself just moments from the excitement of China's largest artificial freshwater lake.
location_description: Intercontinental Shanghai Harbour City, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: No. 1 South Island, Harbour City, Pudong New Area, Shanghai 201306, China
